# Streamerbot_SelfHosted_Chat
Streamerbot SelfHosted Chat

This is a self hosted chat that utilizes Streamerbot to write all the chat messages into a text file, read them and create a webpage using node.js


We use stramerbot to save all the messages from twitch and youtube with:



We have the txt files:
ChatLastline: counts the amount of messages send.
ChatOverlay: save all the messages.
memberlist: save the members, so you can use for effects and etc.
